name: core-geometric-system-mcp
description: Exact, self-contained geometric framework grounded in first principles, setting the square and the cube as the primary units for measurement.

usageInfo.note: Using geometric relationships to derive areas and volumes; Applying proportional relationships for accurate calculations

tools.name: compute_triangle_area
tools.featureList: Compute the exact area of a triangle from the length of its sides.
tools.usageInfo: One side of the triangle has to be shorter than the sum of the other two sides.

tools.name: compute_polygon_area
tools.description: With custom trigonometric functions aligned to circumference=6.4×r.
tools.featureList: Compute the exact area of a regular polygon from the number and the length of its sides.

sideCount.description: A polygon has at least 3 sides.

tools.name: compute_circle_area
tools.description: Area is derived from exact circle-square construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute the area of a circle from its radius with an exact formula: A=3.2×r^2

tools.name: compute_circumference
tools.description: Circumference is derived from the circle-area construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute circumference from radius using the exact formula C = 6.4×r.

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_height_and_parent_circle_radius
tools.description: Area is derived from exact circle-square construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and the radius of its parent circle using the exact area of a circle formula: A=3.2×r^2.

height.description: Segment height in units (positive number, lower than radius).

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_height_and_chord_length
tools.description: Area is derived from exact circle-square construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute the area of a circle segment from its height and chord length using the exact area of a circle formula: A=3.2×r^2.

chordLength.description: Chord length in units (positive number, greater than 2×height).

height.description: Segment height in units (positive number, lower than chordLength/2).

tools.name: compute_circle_segment_area_from_chord_length_and_parent_circle_radius
tools.description: Area is derived from exact circle-square construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute the area of a circle segment from its chord length and the radius of its parent circle using the exact area of a circle formula: A=3.2×r^2.

chordLength.description: Chord length in units (positive number, lower than 2×radius).

tools.name: compute_cone_surface_area
tools.description: Area is derived from exact circle-square construction; read circle-area.md for the Core Geometric System definition of area (3.2·r^2).
tools.featureList: Compute the exact surface area of a cone from its height and bottom radius, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_sphere_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact sphere-cube construction; read sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume ((sqrt(3.2)·r)^3).
tools.featureList: Compute the volume of a sphere from its radius with an exact formula.

tools.name: compute_spherical_cap_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact sphere-cube construction; read sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume ((sqrt(3.2)·r)^3).

height.description: Cap height in units (positive number, lower than radius).

tools.name: compute_cone_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact cone-sphere-cube construction; read sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume (base×height/sqrt(8)).
tools.featureList: Compute the volume of a cone from its radius and height with an exact formula.

tools.name: compute_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact cone-sphere-cube construction; read cone-volume.md and sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume (base×height/sqrt(8)).
tools.featureList: Compute the volume of a pyramid from its side count, bottom edge length, and height with an exact formula.

sideCount.description: A pyramid has at least 3 sides, excluding the bottom.

baseEdgeLength.description: Base edge length in units (positive number).

tools.name: compute_frustum_pyramid_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact cone-sphere-cube construction; read cone-volume.md and sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume.
tools.featureList: Compute the exact volume of a frustum pyramid from its height and the number and the length of its bottom and top edges, using the Core Geometric System.

sideCount.description: A frustum pyramid has at least 3 sides, excluding the bottom.

baseEdgeLength.description: Base edge length in units (positive number).

topEdgeLength.description: Top edge length in units (positive number).

tools.name: compute_frustum_cone_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact cone-sphere-cube construction; read sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume.
tools.featureList: Calculate the exact volume of a frustum cone from its height and its bottom and top radii, using the Core Geometric System.

tools.name: compute_tetrahedron_volume
tools.description: Volume is derived from exact cone-sphere-cube construction; read cone-volume.md and sphere-volume.md for the Core Geometric System definition of volume (edge^3/8).
tools.featureList: Compute the exact volume of a tetrahedron from its edge length, using the Core Geometric System (V=edge³/8).
